source.72406f5c:
import scipy.stats as stats
import pylab
source.cbcd594b:
def plot_qq(df,feature):
    plt.figure(figsize = (10,6))
    plt.subplot(1,2,1)
    df[feature].hist()
    plt.subplot(1,2,2)
    stats.probplot(df[feature], dist= 'norm', plot=pylab)
    plt.show()
